Article.ArticleTitle: Synthesis, Self-Assembly, and Electrocatalysis of Polyallylamine-Functionalized Platinum Nanocubes.

AbstractText: The title composite was prepared and self-assembled on carbon nanotubes (CNTs). Even after cleaning with UV/Ozone and electrochemical methods, the residual polyallylamine strongly influences the electronic structure of Pt. The resultant Pt-NC/CNT nanohybrid shows superior electrochemical activity and stability towards the oxygen reduction reaction in H<sub>2</sub> SO<sub>4</sub> solutions compared with commercial Pt/C catalyst.
